participant_1.background:
I have a very close relationship with my family, and they are always there for me when I need them.
My favorite websites are ones that teach me about new places to climb and share recipes for brownies.
i like to eat hard boiled eggs.
i work for the railroad.
i can t live without my friends.

participant_2.background:
My black and white cat, Cow, is my most valued material possession because he is my best friend and always there for me.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
I'm afraid of crashing my model airplane.
I am not close with my parents.
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.

content.text: Not much, just hanging out. I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
That sounds like a good time. I'm not doing much. I'm just hanging out with my family.
Nice. I'm not close with my parents, so I don't really spend much time with them.
I'm sorry to hear that. I have a really close relationship with my family. They're always there for me when I need them.
That's good. I wish I had that.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, biking, and camping. I also like to build model airplanes.
That sounds like fun. I like to go hiking and biking too. I'm not so much into camping. I'm more of a city person.
I can understand that. I like the outdoors, but I also like being close to civilization.
Me too. So, what's your favorite thing about your cat?
My cat, Cow, is my best friend. He's always there for me when I need him. He's the best listener I know.
That's awesome. I'm glad you have such a good friend in your cat.
